comment: Add your test case here for debugging and run go test -run=One.
query: select /*vt+ ALLOW_VALUES_JOIN */ user_extra.col as col from user join user_extra on user.id = user_extra.id limit 10

plan.Original: select /*vt+ ALLOW_VALUES_JOIN */ user_extra.col as col from user join user_extra on user.id = user_extra.id limit 10

Inputs.FieldQuery: select user_extra.col as col, user_extra.id from user_extra where 1 != 1
Inputs.Query: select /*vt+ ALLOW_VALUES_JOIN */ user_extra.col as col, user_extra.id from user_extra
select /*vt+ ALLOW_VALUES_JOIN */ `values`.user_extra_col from (values ::values) as `values`(user_extra_col, user_extra_id), `user` where `user`.id = `values`.user_extra_id limit 10
